item.title: By: Tisha
item.dc:creator: Tisha
item.description: Right this moment I feel stronger just for having read this. Kudos my lovely friend. One day I hope society will be like "hairy pits, legs and bikini line is beautiful." Damn that woman who first tried to look more like a child!
item.content:encoded: Right this moment I feel stronger just for having read this. Kudos my lovely friend. One day I hope society will be like “hairy pits, legs and bikini line is beautiful.” Damn that woman who first tried to look more like a child!

item.description: That's the most beautiful thing I've read in a while.

item.title: By: Lacey
item.dc:creator: Lacey
item.description: Love it and yes your brows look wonderful!!! I got started on the whole f what the world thinks of my looks when I had el it put thinks into a whole new perspective for me she found comfort in my big squishy boobs and body and any one who thought it was ugly was saying what she loves isn't right screw them! Lol love what you're doing for yourself!! Xoxo my beautiful friend!
